org.bytemechanics.testdrive

Interface DrivenTest


  • public interface DrivenTest
    Driven test interface
    Since:
    0.3.0
    Author:
    afarre

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default void clean()
      Driven test step 4: Clean up environment in order to be able to execute another test with the same test instance
      default void given()
      Driven test step 1: prepare the test environment
      void then()
      Driven test step 3: verify action result
      void when()
      Driven test step 2: action to test

    • Method Detail

      • given

        default void given()
        Driven test step 1: prepare the test environment
        Throws:
        DrivenTestGivenException - if any error happens

      • when

        void when()
        Driven test step 2: action to test
        Throws:
        DrivenTestWhenException - if any error happens

      • then

        void then()
   throws AssertException
        Driven test step 3: verify action result
        Throws:
        DrivenTestThenException - if any error happens not related with an assertion itself
        AssertException - if the assertion fails

      • clean

        default void clean()
        Driven test step 4: Clean up environment in order to be able to execute another test with the same test instance
        Throws:
        DrivenTestCleanException - if any error happens
